code:
stateDiagram-v2
    [IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic] --> FRESH: sm_create_enclave
    FRESH --> RUNNABLE: 初始化完成
    RUNNABLE --> RUNNING: sm_run_enclave
    RUNNING --> RUNNABLE: 正常退出
    RUNNING --> STOPPED: sm_stop_enclave
    STOPPED --> RUNNING: sm_resume_enclave
    RUNNABLE --> DESTROYED: sm_destroy_enclave
    RUNNING --> DESTROYED: sm_destroy_enclave
    STOPPED --> DESTROYED: sm_destroy_enclave
    DESTROYED --> [IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 我们来设计一下这个流程，首先需要一个开始节点。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 你能详细说明一下Generic Diagram吗？

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 最后，流程到达Generic Diagram结束。
